title: Phylogenetic Analysis of SARS-CoV-2 Genomes in Turkey
author: Ogün ADEBALİ, Aylin BİRCAN, Defne ÇİRCİ, Burak İŞLEK, Zeynep KILINÇ, Berkay SELÇUK, Berk TURHAN
affiliations: Molecular Biology, Genetics and Bioengineering, Faculty of Natural Sciences and Engineering, Sabancı University, İstanbul, Turkey
abstract: COVID-19 has effectively spread worldwide. As of May 2020, Turkey is among the top ten countries with the most cases. A comprehensive genomic characterization of the virus isolates in Turkey is yet to be carried out. Here, we built a phylogenetic tree with 15,277 severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-

award-group.funding-source: The Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey
